PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS (1614 - FOOD ADDITIVES) in order to permit the extended use of sodium acetate and sodium diacetate providing the meat, poultry meat and fish industry, two additional antimicrobial preservatives to enhance the safety of their products.
